SELECT r.movieno, t.theaternm, r.viewday, r.roomno, r.tmember, rv.review, rv.star, mu.moviepostimg, mu.movienm FROM reservetb r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewtb rv ON r.movieno = rv.movieno AND r.uuid = rv.uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN movieinfotb_v mu ON r.movieno = mu.movieno LEFT OUTER JOIN theatertb t ON r.areano = t.areano AND r.theaterno = t.theaterno
WHERE r.viewday < NOW()
AND r.uuid = #{uuid} AND r.status = '예매' ORDER BY r.viewday DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM reservetb r WHERE r.viewday < NOW() AND r.uuid = #{uuid} AND r.status = '예매'

SELECT li.movieno, m.moviepostimg, m.movienm, m.releaseday, m.endday, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM liketb WHERE liketb.movieno = m.movieno) AS scrapRate FROM liketb li LEFT OUTER JOIN movieinfotb_v m ON li.movieno = m.movieno WHERE li.uuid = #{uuid} ORDER BY releaseday DESC

SELECT rv.movieno, MAX(r.viewday) AS viewday, rv.review, rv.star, m.movienm FROM reviewtb rv LEFT OUTER JOIN reservetb r ON r.movieno = rv.movieno AND r.uuid = rv.uuid AND r.uuid = #{uuid} LEFT OUTER JOIN movieinfotb_v m ON rv.movieno = m.movieno WHERE rv.uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY rv.movieno, rv.review, rv.star, m.movienm ORDER BY MAX(r.viewday) DESC
